summary.span: 表示由两个 对象的组合定义的二维几何形状。

span.span: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定如何组合两个几何图形。The property specifies how the two geometries will be combined. 请注意， 将两个几何图形指定的区域组合在一起，因此当组合时，没有区域的几何图形（如 ）将消失。Note that combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as ) disappear when combined. 可以通过多种方式组合几何图形：使用 、或 类的 方法。Geometries can be combined in several ways: using a , a , or the method of the class. - 创建一个或多个 对象的复合几何图形。A creates a composite geometry from one or more objects. - 使用指定的布尔运算组合两个 对象所描述的区域。A uses a specified boolean operation to combine the area described by two objects. - 类的静态 方法的行为方式与 对象的行为完全相同。The static method of the class behaves in exactly the same manner as the object. 使用 执行联合时应谨慎考虑，因为这可能会占用大量的 CPU 资源。Careful thought should be involved when using a to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大多数情况下， 或 会更好地工作。In most cases, a or will work better. 仅当下列任一条件适用时，才使用 ：Use a only when any of the following apply: - 几何操作不是联合。The geometric operation is not a union. - 其中一个几何的 值为 ，而几何图形是自相交的（即， 实际上很重要）。Either of the geometries have a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 时间不是问题，但空间为（例如，如果创建了一次并缓存了几何图形）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常， 生成的输出小于 。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 生成的几何图形将在路径动画中描边或使用， 不提供所需的轮廓。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline. ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 是 对象的类型。A is a type of object. 关于功能，例如冻结和克隆，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview).
